text: Shreepur is a village development committee in Sarlahi District in the Janakpur Zone of south-eastern Nepal. At the time of the 1991 Nepal census it had a population of 2925 people living in 487 individual households. ==References== ==External links== *UN map of the municipalities of Sarlahi District Category:Populated places in Sarlahi District
title: Shreeur, Sarlahi
